meta.article_title: October 17, 2016 - Play Both Weaker and Stronger Players

play_both_weaker_and_stronger_players.probleme: Trying to play mostly stronger players

debutant: Try out new shots and combinations against weaker players

exercices_complementaires.description: Serve with backspin, loop the pushed return; develop shot against weaker player

metriques_progression: Develop shot and instincts on when to use it
erreurs_a_eviter: Don't worry about winning or losing; practice
